positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: ‚Ä¢ Coordinated sponsorship drive in Mumbai and Kolkata raising a total of INR 9.45 lakhs, a 19% YoY increase than the previous year ‚Ä¢ Coordinated International Carnival, inviting artists from Iceland, Israel, Denmark, Singapore, Sweden, Canada, and Poland ‚Ä¢ Co-headed a team of 35 Associate Members, expanding the reach of the fest to 650+ colleges and publishing 150+ media articles. ‚Ä¢ Conducted Nation Wide Prelims of 4 Events (Dance/Music/Dramatics) in Mumbai with 65% YoY increase in participation ‚Ä¢ Conducted Nation Wide Prelims of 3 events in Ahmedabad with a 22%YoY increase in participation. ‚Ä¢ Conducted Eliminations of 3 events (literary/Humour fest) in Ranchi with 36%YoY increase in participation ‚Ä¢ Part of the Social Campaign of Spring Fest 2020 Prayatna-Taking a bit out of Hunger which concentrates in take steps to eradicate the hunger issues among the underprivileged school children around the IIT Kharagpur campus. ‚Ä¢ Solely responsible for the conduction of Case Study event India Calling with an increase in the participation by 23%YoY ‚Ä¢ Solely Conducted 8 events of different genres during the fest which saw a participation of more than 700 participants. ‚Ä¢ Spearheaded publicity campaign with a 65% YoY increase in participation from Northeast India by publicizing the fest in over100 colleges.
positions.title: Core Organising Team Member
positions.description_html:
‚Ä¢ Coordinated sponsorship drive in Mumbai and Kolkata raising a total of INR 9.45 lakhs, a 19% YoY increase than the previous year
‚Ä¢ Coordinated International Carnival, inviting artists from Iceland, Israel, Denmark, Singapore, Sweden, Canada, and Poland
‚Ä¢ Co-headed a team of 35 Associate Members, expanding the reach of the fest to 650+ colleges and publishing 150+ media articles.
‚Ä¢ Conducted Nation Wide Prelims of 4 Events (Dance/Music/Dramatics) in Mumbai with 65% YoY increase in participation
‚Ä¢ Conducted Nation Wide Prelims of 3 events in Ahmedabad with a 22%YoY increase in participation.
‚Ä¢ Conducted Eliminations of 3 events (literary/Humour fest) in Ranchi with 36%YoY increase in participation
‚Ä¢ Part of the Social Campaign of Spring Fest 2020 Prayatna-Taking a bit out of Hunger which concentrates in take steps to eradicate the hunger issues among the underprivileged school children around the IIT Kharagpur campus.
‚Ä¢ Solely responsible for the conduction of Case Study event India Calling with an increase in the participation by 23%YoY
‚Ä¢ Solely Conducted 8 events of different genres during the fest which saw a participation of more than 700 participants.
‚Ä¢ Spearheaded publicity campaign with a 65% YoY increase in participation from Northeast India by publicizing the fest in over100 colleges.

positions.subtitle: Spring Fest
positions.description: As an Associate member, I single-handedly led a team of 16 campus ambassadors from different colleges of North East region resulting in a 15% increase in the number of participants. Involved in dealing with media and newspapers with 8 positive newspaper article being printed in northeastern states. I visited 9 colleges in Kolkata and 14 colleges in Agartala and talked to the dean/director of each for publicity purpose.
positions.title: Associate Member

experience.title: Junior Coordinator
experience.description: - National Students' Space Challenge is the first and largest space technology fest in India, organized by Space Technology Students' Society, a student body under Kalpana Chawla Space Technology Cell, IIT Kharagpur which witnessed participation of about 700 students.- During the fest, I along with one senior subhead conducted two overnight workshops named as CANSAT and RC PLANE which experienced participation of over 200 people from various parts of the country.
